summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Friday, August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a detailed operational snapshot of the facility on a specific date, which may be relevant for understanding staffing and security protocols.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Routine daily assignment and shift management for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: The document is a detailed staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019.
It lists numerous posts and assignments including CAPTAIN, SECURITY, SHU (Special Housing Unit), CONTROL, ESCORT, and VISITATION.
It tracks staff statuses such as Day Off, Sick Leave, Annual Leave, LWOP (Leave Without Pay), AWOL, and SUSPENSION.
The roster includes change records showing shift adjustments and officer reliefs throughout the day.
The total staff count listed is 108 Correctional Services Staff and 18 Non-Correctional Services Staff.
